title: Orbiting satellites - v from L for Moon orbit

content.question: A small satellite of mass <math alttext="m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> is orbiting the Moon in an elliptical orbit, as shown in the figure. The satellite is farthest from the Moon at Point <math alttext="A " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>, which is a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> from the Moon’s center, and is closest at Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>, which is a distance <math alttext="the fraction D over 9" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>D</mi><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math> from the Moon’s center. When located at Point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>, the satellite’s angular momentum about the center of the Moon is <math alttext="L sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>L</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>. What is the satellite’s translational speed at Point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction L sub A over D m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mrow><mi>D</mi><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="3 times, the fraction L sub A over D m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mrow><mi>D</mi><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="9 times, the fraction L sub A over D m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>9</mn><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mrow><mi>D</mi><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="81 times, the fraction L sub A over D m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>81</mn><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mrow><mi>D</mi><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="9 times, the fraction L sub A over D m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>9</mn><mfrac><msub><mi>L</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mrow><mi>D</mi><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
